title: Listener Stories: Vol. 20
description:
We've been reading your spooky stories for 20 weeks! Today we've got a stalker in a hurricane, a huge WTF story and a random (or was it?) black eyed kids encounter... and that's why we drink!



Please consider supporting the companies that support us! 



Get an extra 15% off your TomboyX purchase with code STORIES at www.tomboyx.com/stories



Use promo code DRINK at modcloth.com for 15% off your order of $100 or more!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
